directions: Stir chicken breast cubes, water, quinoa, onion, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, curry powder, and ground black pepper together in the bowl of a rice cooker.
Cook on white rice setting according to manufacturer's directions.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) chicken breast, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes, cut into strips
title: Rice Cooker Chicken Quinoa with Sun-dried Tomatoes
